data.title: Kay Mokake - Business and Operations Assistant
data.meta_description: Kay brings previous experience as a project coordinator, at HJ she supports day-to-day operations while working from our Birmingham office
data.text:
Kay is our Business and Operations Assistant. Working from our Birmingham office, she assists with the day-to-day operations at Harper James.

Kay was previously a project coordinator, working in South Korea and then Cameroon before moving to the UK. In South Korea she completed a Masters in Global Economy and Strategy, and most recently, graduated from Ulster University with an MBA.

Having travelled a lot growing up, Kay is fluent in English French, Korean and Italian.

Outside of work Kay enjoy attending food festivals and trying global cuisine. She is a big foodie and loves to cook, so unsurprisingly, her guilty pleasure is watching the Great British bake off.
